glossdef.p: An entity that has been designed so that voting or similar rights are not the dominant factor in deciding who controls the entity, such as when any voting rights relate to administrative tasks only and the relevant activities are directed by means of contractual arrangements.
Paragraphs B22–B24 of IFRS 12 provide further information about structured entities.
